segments.text: Mary , this company is pretty good . I really want to have an interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you made an appointment with this company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not yet . Do I have to ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it's very important to make an appointment before the interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you go to the company without appointment , the interviewers may happen to be busy with other things , and have no time to give you an interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If the interviewers are not in the company , you will go there for nothing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . Why didn't I think of that ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So you should make an appointment in advance with the company for the interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then how can I make the appointment ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You could directly call the company and arrange the time and place for the interview .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you succeed in doing that , you must attend the interview on time .
segments.speaker: S2
